biotools.summary: Calculate TE density for every gene in a genome, along sliding windows, upstream, intragenically, and downstream of genes, and correctly allocate TE density values to a gene along TE Order and Superfamily identities. Our main goal in writing this tool was to provide a clear and concise pipeline/metric to aid in the study of TE presence relative to genes.

bioschemas.name: TE Density
